message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for a quick agreement.
My turn! A 55/45 split is more reasonable, considering I'm being generous by not letting the money lose value... yet.
Don't push your luck, Bob.  I'm being flexible, but time is literally money in this game.
You're feeling the inflation pinch, I'm not. A 58/42 split is my new offer, take it or risk losing more value.
Okay, Bob, let's be realistic. I'm feeling the inflation, but you're pushing too hard. A 55/45 split is my final offer.
You're hurting from inflation, I'm not. A 60/40 split is more than generous, considering the value of your share is plummeting.
